Not just any other phone call. Communication with Context.

Too often, care management programs just end up in having a few phone calls with patients, checking their statuses. Give more context to your care managers. Patients feel closer to their care managers by sharing their data via our RPM platform.

Watch our video

Connecting with patients,
improving their health.

"What gets monitored gets improved". Having one-time-a-year Annual Wellness Visit doesn't treat chronic conditions. It just documents the conditions for the risk adjustment sake. Monitoring and documenting the conditions via RPM can bring substantial improvement for patients.

We tracked the blood pressure readings of the members who had over 160 mmHg systolic blood pressure over a month. We found that, on average, these patients could lower their blood pressure by 35 mmHg after the first 30 days of our Remote Patient Monitoring program.
NOTE: p-value < 2e-16

Orma Health, Inc.
Seamless connect to your patient's home.
